Enums/SeparatorStrategy.html.name: SeparatorStrategy
Enums/SeparatorStrategy.html.abstract: Strategy of separator styling for joining texts in array.

Classes/TextStyle.html#/s:8Texstyle9Text.name: font
Classes/TextStyle.html#/s:8Texstyle9Text.abstract: Use this attribute to change the font for a range of text.

Classes/TextStyle.html#/s:8Texstyle9Text.name: color
Classes/TextStyle.html#/s:8Texstyle9Text.abstract: Use this attribute to specify the color of the text during rendering.

Classes/TextStyle.html#/s:8Texstyle9Text.name: backgroundColor
Classes/TextStyle.html#/s:8Texstyle9Text.abstract: Use this attribute to specify the color of the background area behind the text.

Classes/TextStyle.html#/s:8Texstyle9Text.name: ligature
Classes/TextStyle.html#/s:8Texstyle9Text.abstract: Ligatures cause specific character combinations to be rendered using a single custom glyph

Classes/TextStyle.html#/s:8Texstyle9Text.name: kerning
Classes/TextStyle.html#/s:8Texstyle9Text.abstract: This value specifies the number of points by which to adjust kern-pair characters.

Classes/TextStyle.html#/s:8Texstyle9Text.name: strokeWidth
Classes/TextStyle.html#/s:8Texstyle9Text.abstract: This value represents the amount to change the stroke width and is specified as a percentage of the font point size.

Classes/TextStyle.html#/s:8Texstyle9Text.name: shadowStyle
Classes/TextStyle.html#/s:8Texstyle9Text.abstract: Use this style to specify the shadow.

Classes/TextStyle.html#/s:8Texstyle9Text.name: effectStyle
Classes/TextStyle.html#/s:8Texstyle9Text.abstract: Use this attribute to specify a text effect, such as letterpressStyle.

Classes/TextStyle.html#/s:8Texstyle9Text.name: baselineOffset
Classes/TextStyle.html#/s:8Texstyle9Text.abstract: Use this attribute to specify the character’s offset from the baseline, in points.

Classes/TextStyle.html#/s:8Texstyle9Text.name: obliqueness
Classes/TextStyle.html#/s:8Texstyle9Text.abstract: Use this attribute to specify a skew to be applied to glyphs.

Classes/TextStyle.html#/s:8Texstyle9Text.name: expansion
Classes/TextStyle.html#/s:8Texstyle9Text.abstract: Use this attribute to specify a log of the expansion factor to be applied to glyphs.

Classes/TextStyle.html#/s:8Texstyle9Text.name: strikeThroughLine
Classes/TextStyle.html#/s:8Texstyle9Text.abstract: This value indicates whether the text has a line through it.

Classes/TextStyle.html#/s:8Texstyle9Text.name: underlineLine
Classes/TextStyle.html#/s:8Texstyle9Text.abstract: Undocumented

Classes/TextStyle.html#/s:8Texstyle9Text.name: strokeColor
Classes/TextStyle.html#/s:8Texstyle9Text.abstract: otherwise, it describes the outline color.

Classes/TextStyle.html#/s:8Texstyle9Text.name: attachment
Classes/TextStyle.html#/s:8Texstyle9Text.abstract: The default value of this property is nil, indicating no attachment.

Classes/TextStyle.html#/s:8Texstyle9Text.name: link
Classes/TextStyle.html#/s:8Texstyle9Text.abstract: The default value of this property is nil, indicating no link.

Classes/TextStyle.html#/s:8Texstyle9Text.name: alignment
Classes/TextStyle.html#/s:8Texstyle9Text.abstract: Natural text alignment is realized as left or right alignment depending on the line sweep direction

Classes/TextStyle.html#/s:8Texstyle9Text.name: lineBreakMode
Classes/TextStyle.html#/s:8Texstyle9Text.abstract: This property contains the line break mode to be used laying out the paragraph’s text.

Classes/TextStyle.html#/s:8Texstyle9Text.name: lineSpacing
Classes/TextStyle.html#/s:8Texstyle9Text.abstract: This value is always nonnegative. This value is included in the line fragment heights in the layout manager.

Classes/TextStyle.html#/s:8Texstyle9Text.name: paragraphSpacing
Classes/TextStyle.html#/s:8Texstyle9Text.abstract: This property contains the space (measured in points) added at the end of the paragraph to separate it from the following paragraph.

Classes/TextStyle.html#/s:8Texstyle9Text.name: paragraphSpacingBefore
Classes/TextStyle.html#/s:8Texstyle9Text.abstract: This property contains the space (measured in points) between the paragraph’s top and the beginning of its text content.

Classes/TextStyle.html#/s:8Texstyle9Text.name: lineHeight
Classes/TextStyle.html#/s:8Texstyle9Text.abstract: This property contains the minimum and maximum height in points that any line in the receiver will occupy,

Classes/TextStyle.html#/s:8Texstyle9Text.name: paragraphStyle
Classes/TextStyle.html#/s:8Texstyle9Text.abstract: Use this attribute to apply multiple attributes to a range of text. If you do not specify this attribute,

Classes/TextStyle.html#/s:8Texstyle9Text.abstract: Undocumented

Classes/TextStyle.html#/s:8Texstyle9Text.name: copy()
Classes/TextStyle.html#/s:8Texstyle9Text.abstract: Undocumented

Classes/TextStyle.html#/s:8Texstyle9Text.abstract: Applies center to alignment attribute.

Classes/TextStyle.html#/s:8Texstyle9Text.name: leftAligned()
Classes/TextStyle.html#/s:8Texstyle9Text.abstract: Applies left to alignment attribute.

Classes/TextStyle.html#/s:8Texstyle9Text.name: rightAligned()
Classes/TextStyle.html#/s:8Texstyle9Text.abstract: Applies right to alignment attribute.

Classes/TextStyle.html#/s:8Texstyle9Text.name: naturalAligned()
Classes/TextStyle.html#/s:8Texstyle9Text.abstract: Applies natural to alignment attribute.

Classes/TextStyle.html#/s:8Texstyle9Text.name: justifiedAligned()
Classes/TextStyle.html#/s:8Texstyle9Text.abstract: Applies justified to alignment attribute.

Classes/TextStyle.html#/s:8Texstyle9Text.name: lineHeightReseted()
Classes/TextStyle.html#/s:8Texstyle9Text.abstract: Applies 0 to lineHeight attribute.

Classes/Text.html#/s:8Texstyle4TextC5val.name: init(value:style:)
Classes/Text.html#/s:8Texstyle4TextC5val.abstract: Initialize the text with passed string and style.

Classes/Text.html#/s:8Texstyle4TextC5val.abstract: Initialize the text with passed string and style. Returns nil if there is no value.

Classes/Text.html#/s:8Texstyle4TextC6con.name: concat(_:)
Classes/Text.html#/s:8Texstyle4TextC6con.abstract: Returns a new text by concatenating the passed text.

Classes/Text.html#/s:8Texstyle4TextC12bo.abstract: Returns the bounding rectangle required to draw the string.

Classes/ControlStateText.html#/s:8Texsty.name: init(value:styles:)

Classes/ControlStateText.html#/s:8Texsty.name: init(value:style:)

Classes/ControlStateText.html#/s:8Texsty.name: concat(_:)
